clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
findings: Breast tissue shows unremarkable lesion measuring 5.53 mm.
Uterus appears well-defined; endometrial thickness measures 14.32 mm.
Prostate is isoechoic; volume approximately 29.41 cc.
Left kidney shows well-defined, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Soft tissue region demonstrates isoechoic without fluid collection.
Urinary bladder is unremarkable, no intraluminal lesions.
recommendations: MRI or CT correlation may be helpful.
